articles.description: USC's investigation into the college basketball bribery scandal found no institutional neglect by its program. Athletic director Lynn Swann said then-assistant coach Tony Bland "was operating outside [the] boundaries."
articles.headline: USC probe finds no institutional neglect; Tony Bland acted 'outside boundaries'

articles.description: Gary Chivichyan set career highs with eight 3-pointers and 25 points, Jared Stutzman had four 3s and 20 points, including the go-ahead jumper with 41 seconds left, and Idaho State beat Sacramento State 67-60 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Idaho State hits 12 3s in 67-60 win over Sacramento State

articles.description: The Wildcats have owned the Big East, but recent losses have opened the door for the Musketeers to take the league, starting with Saturday's matchup.
articles.headline: Weekend lookahead: Xavier, Villanova battle for Big East supremacy

images.caption: Xavier can avenge its Jan. 10 loss to Villanova when the Wildcats visit on Saturday.
images.name: Tyrique Jones [576x324]

articles.description: In a league as competitive as the Big 12, opportunities abound for quality wins. The problem, as Texas and Oklahoma are learning in recent weeks, is winning those games. Will the Longhorns or Sooners end their losing streaks this weekend?
articles.headline: Bubble Watch: Struggling to survive in a rugged Big 12

images.caption: Texas wants to end its three-game losing streak on Saturday against Oklahoma.
images.name: Bamba_Mohamed 180213 [608x342]

images.caption: Deandre Ayton scores 25 points and grabs 16 rebounds as No. 17 Arizona holds off No. 25 Arizona State, 77-70.
images.name: Arizona completes season sweep of Arizona State

articles.description: Gregg Marshall yells and screams. That's how he gets his point across. But he also listens. Amid an up-and-down year at Wichita State, the man whom bigger programs are always chasing will listen again.
articles.headline: It's time for the almost-annual question: Can Wichita State keep Gregg Marshall?

images.caption: Gregg Marshall has had chances to leave Wichita State. Is this the time he actually bolts?
images.name: Gregg Marshall [1296x864]

images.caption: Wichita State fans are behind Gregg Marshall. That much is clear.
images.name: Gregg Marshall [608x342]

images.caption: Gregg Marshall does not mince words when he wants to get his point across.
images.name: Gregg Marshall [608x342]

articles.description: After being asked to not single out Arizona State players using his megaphone, an Arizona cheerleader continued to heckle and was ejected.
articles.headline: Arizona cheerleader ejected for using megaphone to yell at players

images.caption: After being asked to not single out Arizona State players using his megaphone, an Arizona cheerleader continued to heckle and was ejected.
images.name: Arizona cheerleader ejected for using megaphone to yell at players

videos.description: Matthew Moyer sinks the 3-pointer off a kick out pass from Tyus Battle.
videos.headline: Syracuse's Moyer  knocks down 3

videos.description: Tyus Battle steals off the pass and races the length of the floor for a slam dunk.
videos.headline: Syracuse's Battle with steal and dunk

videos.description: Jalen Adams scores a layup off the pass for an and-1 to pull the Huskies closer to Syracuse.
videos.headline: UConn's Adams with a layup and-1

videos.description: Matthew Moyer cleans up his teammates' miss with a slam dunk to energize the Orange.
videos.headline: Syracuse's Moyer throws down the putback dunk

videos.description: Frank Howard lobe it over-the-top to Oshae Brissett who climbs the ladder for the slam.
videos.headline: Howard, Brissett connect for alley-oop dunk

videos.description: Tyus Battle scores a layup and draws the foul for a three-point play for Syracuse.
videos.headline: Battle drives and scores with and-1

videos.description: Tyus Battle drives and dishes to Matthew Moyer for an Orange slam dunk.
videos.headline: Battle sets up Moyer for two-handed dunk

videos.description: Christian Vital hits Jalen Adams for a transition layup to cut the Syracuse lead to 60-51 in the second half.
videos.headline: UConn's Vital, Adams connect for fast break layup

videos.description: Tyus Battle lobs it up to Oshae Brissett for a two-handed dunk to extend the Syracuse lead to 11 in the second half.
videos.headline: Battle, Brissett team up for slam to increase the lead

videos.description: Tyus Battle tells Holly Rowe after Syracuse's win over UConn that he was trying to "stay aggressive" but admits that he's never missed a dunk so badly before and says he'll "have to live with that one."
videos.headline: Battle says he must've had 'dead legs' on missed dunk

videos.description: Tyus Battle runs the floor, raises up and misses the right-handed dunk attempt for Syracuse.
videos.headline: Battle bricks the dunk
